KiwiPirate, i may look stupid but what do i need to edit in the registry? I did everything instructions told me and came to that part. No idea what to change. When i use the exe the game starts updating as does uplay which i think shouldn't happen. What do i do?

extract " Patched DLLs.rar " directly into your game folder. sorry but that was my stuff up as i never added that to instructions because i thought i had already put them in the folder before i archived it. i'm the stupid one :-)

as for the registry you do not need to edit anything in it, just make sure you double click the required one for your OS. (x86 or x64) - if your unsure of which one you have check this http://support.microsoft.com/kb/827218

Hi Kiwi, sorry if i sound really noob. I got a problem here, first i tried to install following your guide, added patched.dll + i double clicked the x86.reg and i got "system can't find specified file", so i thought the problem must be in the .reg. So then i uninstall everything, reinstall + added patched.dll but this time without clicking the .reg file and it works, I played the tutorial campaign game, but then after the first one, i got a black screen, so i thought it might be because i didn't activate the reg file, well idk what caused that. I clicked on .reg file and it was "system can't find specified file" again. I tried editing the .reg files too, still not working. I wonder what is wrong? can you help me?

oh btw there are \ on between the path there. I forgot to double typed so it didn't show on the comment

cnulove, to fix the black screen error right click the main " Might & Magic Heroes VI.exe " select properties and then compatibility .
set the compatibility to whatever your OS is
if you have Win7 then set compatibility to Win7
if XP then set it to XP ...
this seams to be a problem with the game and not the crack as legit users have the same problem on the Ubisoft forums

the reg settings look fine, try compatibility and if you get the can't find file error try reinstalling the game but do not use the *.reg file
just make sure you have the extra version settings
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Ubisoft\Might & Magic Heroes VI\1.8
and
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Ubisoft\Might & Magic Heroes VI - Shades of Darkness\2.1.0
plus
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Ubisoft\Might & Magic Heroes VI\"Product Version"="2.1.0"

Might & Magic Heroes VI.exe is the exe you use to run the game so make sure any shortcut is correct

also if you have the Catalyst repack installed then you must extract DATAxx.rar into your game file or game will not work, you will only get that missing file error

El_Nazgir, 
all files are originals and safe except the cracked dlls which was done by crack group Reloaded
they are safe so you can safely add them to your exclusion list in you anti malware program

if you are getting stuck on loadup then right click the *.reg file you used and select 'Edit'
find these two lines and put the full path to your game

"DataPath"="..\HeroesVI\Data"
"InstallPath"="..\Might&Magic\HeroesVI"

example:
"DataPath"="C:\Games\HeroesVI\Data"
"InstallPath"="C:\Games\Might&Magic\HeroesVI"
